attributes.action: increase the size of the british army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to increase the size of the british army so that it can cope with all its commitments and which will  give its soldiers and familys more time away  from combat operations

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/thearmy/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
